alert.note: Alert for Olmsted; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:23PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winona and east central Olmsted Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Altura, or 18 miles west of Winona, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lewiston and Altura around 930 PM CDT. Stockton and Rollingstone around 940 PM CDT. Winona, Goodview and Fountain City around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Whitewater State Park, County Roads 9 And 10, Elba, Whitman, County Roads 28 And 31, Utica, Lazy D Campground, Lock And Dam 5, Beaver and Minnesota City. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 230 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
